Texts.Chs: 在与叶族进行的边境之战中，军刀级的战列巡洋舰USS的指挥官[被涂抹]使用数千加仑的2.4-D溶液(简称为除草剂)来阻挡叶族的进攻，以缓解日益疲劳的USCM部队。
Texts.Eng: During one of many border skirmishes with the expansionist Florans, Commander [Redacted] of the Sabre-class Battlecruiser USS [Redacted] attempted to relieve embattled USCM troops by covering advancing Floran forces with thousands of gallons of Solution 2,4-D, otherwise known as herbicide.

Texts.Chs: 然而，效果不如预期中顺利，它对人类造成的作用相当于酒精一般。人类的醉酒行为，使得叶族对部队进行压倒性的反攻，以确保殖民飞船在足够长的时间内完成紧急撤退。
Texts.Eng: The effect however, did not perform as expected, with the solution having roughly the same poisonous qualities as alcohol does to a human. Nevertheless, the move "distracted" the Florans enough for the Marines to launch a counterattack and overwhelm them, securing the planetside colony long enough to complete its emergency evacuation.

Texts.Chs: 这个战术从[被涂抹]行动中使用至今，再也未被使用。
Texts.Eng: The tactic has not seen use since, but lives on in history as the [Redacted] Manoeuvre.

Texts.Chs: 在[被涂抹]，USCM于叶族首次接触中，USCM远远低估了叶族的野蛮与狡猾与侵略性。
Texts.Eng: Upon first contact with the Floran Brood in [Redacted], the USCM far underestimated the level of aggression, cunning and savagery the Floran race would eventually become known for.
